item.description:
Healing for Joints and More - a special, whole body and mind holistic program.

This program is designed to help people who suffer from ongoing chronic health issues.
Many internal organ problems develop in the human body because of bad posture, uneven shoulders and hips, or spine injuries. A little twist in the vertebrae can result in hands and feet coldness or poor blood circulation in different areas of the body. In effect, this holistic program is created not only for people with joint pain and discomfort, but also to assist healing of all kinds, including headaches, indigestion, pain and aches in the body, arthritis, neck and shoulder issues, back issues, knee issues, hip issues, emotional issues, insomnia and depression.

Our body relies on the health of our bones and joints and the entire skeletal system to function properly, and it is very important to take good care of it. Please come and take this class to
connect with your body and engage in the process of its healing mindfully.

This holistic program includes drawing, a combination of slow and vigorous Qi-Gong exercises, relaxation with visualization, and positive affirmations based on the work of Louise L. Hay.

70 mins class includes:

 ~meditation,

~warm up,

~stretching,

~Qi Gong,

~floor exercises for spine alignment,

~gentle massage,

~and relaxation.

 

Healing for Joints program is great for anyone who wants to improve their health!

In every class you will choose your positive affirmations for the day or week, and this will be a great aid in your body's transformation.

------------------------------------- 

Warning:
If you have any serious back or joints problems always consult your physician before starting any classes with physical activity and inform the instructor about them!

Price: $18.00.
Please wear comfortable clothes and bring a mat and bottle of water.

When: Saturday, 10:00am-11:30am


Where: visit http://www.eternal-ba... for directions

For questions call Angela (510) 366-1686
item.how_to_find_us: visit http://www.eternal-balance.com for correct directions, it's easy to get lost in the building 100 at Cummings center.
item.name: Healing for Joints program. Introduction class.
